instruction: Provide a detailed description of the features of the given product.
output: The Google Pixel 3 is a high-end flagship smartphone released in October 2018 by Google. It features a 5.5" Full HD+ OLED display, an IP68 dust and water resistance rating, and an Adreno 630 GPU to handle the most demanding apps and games. It runs on a Qualcomm Snapdragon 845 chipset, featuring 8GB of RAM and 128/256GB of storage. On the back, it has a pair of 12.2MP cameras, and an 8MP front camera. It also features wireless charging, and fast charging with the included 18W charger. Its battery has a capacity of 2915 mAh and can provide up to 7 hours of talk time.
